Description: Ostracon (?), small fragment of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is partially red and grey in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is painted white with remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394759) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394759)
